original_text: And whatsoever shall seem good to thee, and to thy brethren, to do with the rest of the silver and the gold, that do after the will of your God.
korean_text: 그 나머지 은금은 너와 너의 형제가 좋게 여기는 일에 너희 하나님의 뜻을 따라 쓸지며

sentences.original_text: And whatsoever shall seem good to thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너에게 좋게 보이는 것은 무엇이든

sentences.original_text: to do with the rest of the silver and the gold
that do after the will of your God
